titlestmt.titleproper: BU Records: University Research Committee, Inclusive: 1975-1981

note.p: Â© 2021 The Texas Collection. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary
did.abstract: BU Records: University Research Committee includes reports regarding funds distributed by the committee from 1975-1981.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: Baylor University's University Research Committee is charged with promoting and encouraging faculty research and external funding of that research, as well as distributing funds for the support of scholarly research projects. The committee reports to the Vice Provost for Research and is comprised of twelve at-large members appointment by the Committee on Committees. The Vice Provost for Research, Director of the Office of Sponsored Programs and Contracts, Dean of Libraries and Vice President for Information Technology, and Dean of the Graduate School all serve as ex officio members on the committee.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection begins in 1975 and ends in 1981. The collection contains research reports relating to the University Research Committee Grant. Each report provides the name of the individual who received the grant, their department, the title of their project, the grant amount, the grant term, and a summary with six required aspects.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Prior to current processing, the collection was in two unlabeled folders. Currently, the collection is divided into two folders and is arranged in one series: I. Reports. Within the folders, materials are arranged in original order, which is alphabetical by last name of grant recipient.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: BU Records: University Research Committee, Accession #BU/302, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Leanna Barcelona. Released on 2020-03-24.

bibref.extref: "University Research Committee." Baylor University. Accessed 2020 March 2.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series includes two folders of reports submitted to the University Research Committee between 1975 and 1981. The reports are in alphabetical order by last name of the grant recipient. This series is in good condition.
